Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
This Main program implements a simple card game that contains all instance variables, GUI objects and logic.
Author:
Raphaele Guillemot

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This is the main method which initialises the game
      Parameters:
      args - unused

    • init

      public void init()
      This method calls all the relevant elements that needs to be initialised: the deck, the GUI, and set the GUI to start a game

    • createGUI

      public void createGUI()
      This method sets up all the GUI that will last for the rest of the program runtime

    • initGUI

      public void initGUI()
      This method sets the GUI so that it's ready for a new game. This is called every time a game ends

    • makeBet

      public void makeBet(String bet)
      This method checks whether it's a valid bet, and if it is, saves the bet, and starts the game through startGame()
      Parameters:
      bet - , which is the userInput

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      A Method that starts the game by hiding the Dealer's cards, updating both dealer's and player's hand, and enabling buttons, as well as reshuffle

    • replaceCards

      public void replaceCards(int pos, JLabel obj, JButton rp)
      The method handling the replace card button action. Takes the next card from deck and updates image, while disabling the corresponding button
      Parameters:
      pos - , an integer that identifies which card is being replaced
      obj - , a JLabel that represents the Card to be updated
      rp - , the replace card JButton that is linked to the targeted card

    • resultAction

      public void resultAction()
      This method concludes the game by showing the dealer's hand, updating the bank and pops up an alert of the results.

    • disableBtn

      public void disableBtn(JButton btn)
      A helper method that disables buttons
      Parameters:
      btn - , the JButton to be disabled

    • enableBtn

      public void enableBtn(JButton btn)
      A helper method that enables buttons
      Parameters:
      btn - , the JButton to be enabled

    • setCardImg

      public void setCardImg(int file, JLabel card)
      A helper method that updates a card's image
      Parameters:
      file - , an integer that represents the card's value and therefore file name
      card - , the JLabel card that is to be updated with the new image

    • calcWinner

      public int calcWinner()
      A helper method that calculates who the winner is.
      Returns:
      an integer that indicated who won. 0 for Dealer, 1 for Player
